title: I just realized Riot ripped off Ori with Bard.

replies.body: I was thinking...what's wrong with Orianna lol...

Ori? As in Ori and the Blind Forest? I haven't played that game, looking to though.

Anyways because _clearly _ any celestial fat guy of some description is instantly a rip off of Ori aye.

But really though, Bard is a combination between Totoro, Princess Mononoke and Spirited Away, then put in a touch of Blitz for good measures.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=JB9TEw7E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-04T15:35:00.687+0000)
>
> Ori? As in Ori and the Blind Forest? I haven't played that game, looking to though.
> 
> Anyways because _clearly _ any celestial fat guy of some description is instantly a rip off of Ori aye.
> 
> But really though, Bard is a combination between Totoro, Princess Mononoke and Spirited Away, then put in a touch of Blitz for good measures.

The games like prolouge is fucking amazing, imo. Much sad.
